import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Contact(){const[form,setForm]=useState({name:"",email:"",message:""});const[sent,setSent]=useState(false);function handleChange(e){setForm({...form,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});}function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();setSent(true);// Here you should integrate with an email service or backend to send the message.
}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"max-w-3xl mx-auto py-12 px-4",id:"contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6",children:"Contact Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"bg-white rounded shadow p-6 flex flex-col gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Your Name",className:"border rounded px-3 py-2",value:form.name,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Your Email",className:"border rounded px-3 py-2",value:form.email,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",placeholder:"Your Message",className:"border rounded px-3 py-2 h-28",value:form.message,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-blue-900 text-white font-semibold px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-800 transition",disabled:sent,children:sent?"Message Sent!":"Send Message"})]})]});}
